name: Eastern Mennonite University
faculty: 104 full-time, 101 part-time  ; 10-1 student-faculty ratio;   majority of classes fewer than 20 students.
postgrad: 323 degree-seeking students   in 7 masters programs – biomedicine, business, conflict transformation, counseling, education, nursing, organizational leadership, plus in seminary, offering master's degrees in divinity, church leadership, and religion.
athletics: NCAA Division III, Old Dominion Athletic Conference Men's and women's basketball, cross-country, soccer, indoor and outdoor track & field, volleyball; golf; baseball for men; softball and field hockey for women.
